casebody.data:
Tawana F. SAMPSON, Plaintiff,
v.
Daryl LANIER, Individually and as Member of the Guilford County Sheriff's Department; B.J. Barnes, Sheriff of Guilford County; and The Local Government Excess Liability Fund, Inc., Defendants. No. COA16-1135 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: July 5, 2017

DISMISSED.
